Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Yale
ShortDescription: #119 Michigan/119th buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th. 

Allow extra travel time. 

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on 119th between Wentworth and Yale.

Headline: Green Line Service Delayed near Oak Park
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing near Oak Park due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing near Oak Park due to police activity.
Personnel are working to restore service.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area

At this time, consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines

Allow extra travel time.
